feed.title: Removing channel reserve for mobile wallet users

entry.title: Removing channel reserve for mobile wallet users
entry.summary: The email discusses the potential complications that may arise when differentiating between types of participants in a protocol. The sender raises questions about how this differentiation will affect various processes such as creating commitments, forwarding HTLCs, and finding routes. It suggests that considering participant type may add complexity to these tasks. However, no further information or context is provided in the email.
